title: PM sorrowful over loss of Pakistanis’ lives in boat tragedy
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 16 (APP):Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif Thursday expressed grief over the accident of a boat sailing from West Africa to Spain.
He prayed for the elevation of ranks of Pakistanis who lost their lives in the tragedy.
He condoled with the bereaved families. He sought a report from the relevant officials about the incident.
He warned of strict action against the persons involved in the repulsive act of human smuggling.
He said no negligence on the matter would be tolerated, adding, “We are taking strong measures against human smuggling.”
